channel.title: software on Hugo Book
channel.description: Recent content in software on Hugo Book

item.title: software
item.description: software # import "fyne.io/fyne/v2/driver/software" Usage # func NewCanvas # func NewCanvas() test.WindowlessCanvas NewCanvas creates a new canvas in memory that can render without hardware support func Render # func Render(obj fyne.CanvasObject, t fyne.Theme) image.Image Render takes a canvas object and renders it to a regular Go image using the provided Theme. The returned image will be set to the object’s minimum size. Use the theme.LightTheme() or theme.
